Robyn_and_Ryleigh:
{{short description|Canadian country music duo}} {{Use dmy dates|date=December 2018}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Robyn and Ryleigh | image = | caption = | image_size = | origin = [[Langley, British Columbia (city)|Langley]], [[British Columbia]], Canada | genre = [[Country music|Country]] | years_active = | label = [[Royalty Records]] | website = {{URL|www.robynandryleigh.com}} | current_members = Robyn Gillespie
Ryleigh Gillespie }} '''Robyn and Ryleigh''' Gillespie are a sister duo of country/pop singer-songwriters from [[Langley, British Columbia (city)|Langley]], [[British Columbia]].{{Cite web|url=https://www.bclocalnews.com/entertainment/robyn-and-ryleigh-go-on-the-record/|title = Robyn and Ryleigh go on the record|date = 23 March 2015}}{{cite web| url = https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/british-columbia/cbc-musical-nooners-july-29-robyn-ryleigh-1.3168427| title = CBC Musical Nooners July 29: Robyn & Ryleigh {{!}} CBC News}} In 2013, their self-titled debut album ''Robyn and Ryleigh'' was released on Raincoast Music/[[MDM Recordings Inc.|MDM Recordings]].{{Cite web |title=About â€“ Robyn & Ryleigh |url=http://www.robynandryleigh.com/about/ |website=Robyn & Ryleigh |access-date=2015-10-16 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150915040921/http://www.robynandryleigh.com/about/ |archive-date=2015-09-15 |url-status=live }} Robyn & Ryleigh were signed to [[Royalty Records]] in 2015, and have distribution through [[Sony Music Canada|Sony Music Entertainment]]. The sisters released a single with Royalty called "I Found You" on 18 May 2015.{{Cite web |title=New Music & Video From Sister Duo Robyn & Ryleigh |url=http://royaltyrecords.ca/?p=5934 |website=Royalty Records |access-date=2015-10-16 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150905083050/http://royaltyrecords.ca/?p=5934 |archive-date=2015-09-05 |url-status=live }} Robyn and Ryleigh were nominated in 2015 for British Columbia Country Music Association awards (BCCMA Awards) in the categories of Group/Duo of the Year, Songwriter of the Year, and Website of the Year.{{Cite web |title=Robyn & Ryleigh Nominated in 3 Categories at This Year's BC Country Music Association Awards |url=http://royaltyrecords.ca/?p=6145 |website=Royalty Records |access-date=2015-10-16 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160304023637/http://royaltyrecords.ca/?p=6145 |archive-date=2016-03-04 |url-status=live }} == Discography == === Studio albums === {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! style="width:12em;" | Title ! style="width:18em;" | Details |- ! scope="row" | ''Robyn and Ryleigh'' | * Release date: 16 July 2013 * Label: [[MDM Recordings Inc.|MDM Recordings]] |- ! scope="row" | ''By Heart'' | * Release date: 15 January 2016 * Label: [[Royalty Records]] |} === Singles === {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! Year ! style="width:12em;" | Single !
